Paul An
Senior Gameplay Designer
Projects About

Projects

A selection of my work in game design, combat systems, and gameplay implementation across AAA and indie projects.

Drop Fake — Senior Gameplay Designer (Unannounced AAA Mobile Project)

Role - Senior Gameplay Designer

Owned combat feature design and implementation in Unity, shipping character kits from paper design to playable prototypes, collaborating with engineering, animation, and VFX, and iterating for clarity, balance, and feel. Contributed heavily to FTUE/tutorial flows and cross-discipline production coordination.

UnityDesignAAAMobile
Mortal Kombat - Onslaught

Role - Associate Game Designer

Designed and implemented characters and character abilities using UE5 Blueprints for Mortal Kombat: Onslaught. Worked with engineers, animators, artists, and producers to create a AAA mobile experience.

UnrealDesignAAA
WindWalker

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

Windwalker is a 3D turn-based RPG where players collect loot from combat and other encounters to cleanse the plague stirring in the fantastical world of Qubis. Enjoy a hand-crafted world, thousands of unique items and creatures, and acquire powerful pets to fight alongside you.

UnityDesignAndroid
Potty Power

Role - Solo Development

A retro-arcade style minigame where players aim their potty stream to score points. Features power-ups, time extensions, and increasing difficulty. Available on Google Play Store.

UnityC#Android
dog (Bao Edition)

Role - Solo Development

A narrative-driven game featuring multiple minigames, dedicated to my pomeranian Bao. Players explore a Southern California apartment and complete missions while the owners are away. Created in 1 month as a passion project.

UnityC#
Factory Reset

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

A PC hack-and-slash ARPG created for a Game Jam, featuring a robust crafting system and thousands of unique loot combinations. Fast-paced combat with RPG progression elements.

UnityC#PC
Deathfall Wolfpine

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

A 1v1 arena PvP game featuring best-of-7 combat matches. Includes a modular weapon system (hilt, pommel, blade combinations) and real-time multiplayer networking using Photon PUN2. Built with Unity HDRP for high-fidelity graphics.

UnityC#MultiplayerPC
Elwood

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

A turn-based RPG prototype featuring combat abilities, patrolling enemies, and a linear progression system. My first 3D Unity project where I handled level design, combat design, and programming.

UnityC#PC
Super Paulo Man

Role - Solo Development

A classic 2D platformer inspired by retro platforming games. Features traditional jumping mechanics, enemy combat, and level progression. Playable in WebGL.

UnityC#WEBGL
